## Source: khulnasoft-package-analysis (b965422ee9e40d44ce5d495937f3d567372ae2d7ca4fdc19b19df60951020095)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'symphony-markdown' @ 1.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
